attributes.action: Bring back the balance of power away from illegal migrants
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I would like the prime minister to increase the boarder security, remove illegals(including the lost criminals) and stop all rights and benefits for those already here in the UK.

Also remove the fixed marriage cop out that allows them to stay after a time should they pay or arrange a sham marraige here in the UK.
